content:
Master the Art of Coupon Codes

Coupon codes are your secret weapon for massive savings. Here's everything you need to know to become a savvy online shopper.

üìã Step-by-Step Guide:

  1. Find Valid Codes: Visit ThriftMaal.com for verified, working coupon codes updated daily
  2. Check Eligibility: Read terms - minimum order value, category restrictions, validity dates
  3. Apply at Checkout: Look for 'Apply Coupon' or 'Promo Code' box before payment
  4. Verify Discount: Ensure the discount reflects in your final bill

üí∞ Types of Coupon Codes:

  • Percentage Off: GET20 (20% discount)
  • Flat Amount: SAVE500 (‚Çπ500 off)
  • Free Shipping: SHIP0 (No delivery charges)
  • Category Specific: FASHION50 (50% off fashion items)

üéØ Pro Tips:

Stacking Offers: Many sites allow combining bank offers with coupon codes for double savings. For example: Use a 15% coupon + 10% bank discount = 25% total savings!

Abandonment Discounts: Add items to cart and wait 24 hours. Many sites send special discount codes via email to complete your purchase.

ThriftMaal Advantage: We test every code before publishing, so you never waste time on expired coupons!

Essential Browser Tools for Smart Shopping

Automatically finds and applies the best coupon codes at checkout. Works on 500+ Indian websites including Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra.

Global extension that tests multiple coupon codes and applies the best one. Also offers cashback rewards.

3. Keepa - Amazon Price Tracker

Shows historical price charts for any Amazon product. Get alerts when prices drop to your target level.

4. CamelCamelCamel

Another excellent Amazon price tracker with email alerts and browser integration.

5. InvisibleHand

Compares prices across different stores while you browse. Shows if the same product is cheaper elsewhere.

title: How to Identify Fake Discount Scams Online
summary: Protect yourself from fraudulent deals and fake discount scams. Learn red flags, verification methods, and safe shopping practices.
keywords: online shopping safety, fake deals, scam protection, secure shopping, fraud prevention
aiSummary: Safety guide covering common online shopping scams, red flags to watch for, and verification methods to ensure legitimate deals. Includes tips for secure transactions.
content:
Stay Safe: Spot Fake Deals & Scams

Online shopping is convenient, but scammers are getting smarter. Here's how to protect yourself.

üö© Red Flags to Watch:

  • Too Good to Be True: iPhone at ‚Çπ5,000? Definitely a scam
  • Urgent Pressure: 'Only 2 hours left!' tactics to rush decisions
  • Unknown Websites: New domains with no customer reviews
  • Payment Issues: Asking for direct bank transfer or cryptocurrency
  • Poor Website Quality: Spelling errors, broken links, unprofessional design

‚úÖ Verification Checklist:

  1. Check Domain Age: Use WhoIs lookup - new domains are risky
  2. Read Reviews: Search '[website name] review scam' on Google
  3. Verify Contact Info: Legitimate businesses have clear contact details
  4. SSL Certificate: Look for padlock icon and 'https://' in URL
  5. Social Media Presence: Real companies have active social accounts

üõ°Ô∏è Safe Shopping Practices:

Use Credit Cards: Better fraud protection than debit cards

Enable 2FA: Two-factor authentication adds security layer

Check Bank Statements: Monitor for unauthorized charges

Use ThriftMaal: We verify all deals and link only to trusted retailers

üéØ What To Do If Scammed:

  1. Contact your bank immediately to block card
  2. Report to cybercrime.gov.in
  3. File complaint with consumer forum
  4. Leave reviews warning others

Remember: If a deal seems too good to be true, it probably is. Stick to verified platforms like those listed on ThriftMaal.com!

title: Cashback Apps Comparison: Which Saves You More?
summary: Complete comparison of India's top cashback apps - Paytm, PhonePe, Google Pay, CRED, and more. Find out which app gives maximum returns!
keywords: cashback apps, best rewards apps, paytm cashback, phonepe rewards, money saving apps
aiSummary: Detailed comparison of popular Indian cashback and rewards apps including features, earning potential, redemption options, and user experience ratings.
content:
Cashback Apps Face-Off: 2025 Edition

Everyone loves free money! But which cashback app actually delivers the most value? We tested them all.

üí∞ Top Cashback Apps Compared:

1. Paytm Cashback

Earning: 1-5% on most transactions
Best For: Utility bill payments, recharges
Redemption: Instant to Paytm wallet
Rating: 4.2/5

2. PhonePe Rewards

Earning: Scratch cards on every transaction
Best For: UPI payments, shopping
Redemption: Direct bank transfer
Rating: 4.5/5

3. CRED Rewards

Earning: CRED coins on credit card bill payments
Best For: Credit card users
Redemption: Brand vouchers, products
Rating: 4.3/5

4. Amazon Pay Cashback

Earning: 2-10% on select merchants
Best For: Amazon ecosystem users
Redemption: Amazon Pay balance
Rating: 4.4/5

5. Google Pay Rewards

Earning: Rewards stamps, occasional offers
Best For: Daily small transactions
Redemption: Direct to bank account
Rating: 4.1/5

üéØ Our Verdict:

Overall Winner: PhonePe - Most consistent rewards and easy redemption

Best for Credit Cards: CRED - Exclusive benefits for credit card users

Best for Shopping: Amazon Pay - Highest cashback on e-commerce

üí° Pro Strategy:

Don't stick to one app! Use different apps for different purposes:

  • PhonePe for daily UPI payments
  • CRED for credit card bills
  • Amazon Pay for online shopping
  • Paytm for utility bills

Combine these with ThriftMaal coupon codes for double savings!
